title: Inability to select skin during champion select in the new client without locking in the champion
body:
Hi, I'm not sure if this is an intended feature or not, but in normal blind pick in the new client I found that I was unable to select a skin for the champion that I picked, but didn't lock in. I had to lock in the champion first to be able to select a skin. In the current client (legacy), I'm able to select a skin for a champion that I declared without having to lock them in. Again, this "issue" is in blind pick normals, and please correct me if I'm wrong. Thanks :)

(repost from Gameplay board to Help & Support board)

replies.body:
Having to lock in your champion choice **before** being able to select a skin for that champion is working as intended. I'm not sure if this is how it will work in the finished version of the client, but this is how it's intended for now.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
